Deutsch: Sonderverwaltungszone, SAR (engl: Special Administration Region) (S, Pol)
English: special administrative region (SAR), of which there are two in the PRC: Hong Kong `香~`港~ and Macau `澳門~|`澳~门

d.f: `政府~`劃定~`的~`特別行政區~`域~。`如~`海南島~`特別行政區~。

Deutsch: Sonderverwaltungszone, SAR (engl: Special Administration Region) (S, Pol)
English: special administrative region (SAR), of which there are two in the PRC: Hong Kong `香~`港~ and Macau `澳門~|`澳~门
refers to many different areas during late Qing, foreign occupation, warlord period and Nationalist government
refers to special zones in North Korea and Indonesia
